name: @tmnrp/react-sidebar
description: React sidebar is a component that can be used to display sidebar.
author: TMRNP <harsh.harish1@gmail.com> (https://tmnrp-portfolio.vercel.app/)

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:pub:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.build:pub:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.build:pub:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish --access public
